author: Ken Smith
comment: Changing my review of this.  Now been using it for a while and whilst limited in function it does work. I can control all 5 connect amps from my watch. Allows control over basic functions but better than nothing. Sometimes won't connect. Using Samsung S7 Edge and Sony SW3
title: It works.......

author: ADRIAN TRELFA
comment: My Sony Smart Watch will not connect to my Sonos Play 3 so this app is pretty useless.

author: Mark Lennard
comment: Does not work, does not connect with sonos

author: Eric Bridgwater
comment: Stopped connecting to my phone :(
title: Does the job.

author: Robert Petrie
comment: Doesn't work. Keeps saying 'waiting to  connect'.
title: Doesn't connect. Refund please

author: henning oberg
comment: Does exactly what it says. Easy to use. Well done.  Hopefully this app will be further developed.
title: Basic control of Sonos through smartwatch

author: Brian salmon
comment: It is really good. However, once in a while it may not connect.

reply.author: Freddroid
reply.content:
Hi Brian!
The option to control it from the notification area will come in a future update!

Cheers!
Fredrik

title: Nice watch app

author: Rob Williams
comment: Works well on Huawei. Surprising how much control you have using a watch!

author: Pete Rockwell
comment: As another reviewer remarked, the volume steps are far too wide, making it hard to adjust volume to the exact level you want. Adjust this to make the steps finer or, even better, give me a choice between up/down buttons and a slider. THAT would be five-star stuff.
title: Works great, but volume control is too chunky

author: Mentor Ahmeti
comment: After 2 months of waiting to connect and endless amount of battery wastage I'm giving it one star.  Did not connect a single time. Up to date Moto+S5.
title: Doesn't work.

author: Shakeel Soogun
comment: Launched phone app as stated in the description and it says it's connected, but when launching it on my Moto 360 it does not seem to find it (endlessly shows "Waiting on device").
title: Seems promising but not working

author: akarunaratne76
comment: Worked well first few times. .. now keeps saying waiting on device and doesn't connect...very frustrating. ...was very nice while it worked....
title: worked well....then.....puff!

author: Brendan Farrell
comment: Updated everythin, Reinstalled everything,  restarted everything but still stuck on connecting to sonos. :-(   Sony Smartwatch 3
title: Cannot connect to sonos

author: John Moscato
comment: This app performs well and makes great use of the Android Wear UI on my LG G Watch R. Two items I noticed: it would be nice if the volume up/down steps were finer (they raise/lower the volume a little too much with one press), and if I accidentally press the previous/next track buttons while watching TV the sound stops completely and I have to use my remote to get sound again (Sonos Playbar). Otherwise, well done!
title: Great little Sonos controller

author: Louis Mangov
comment: Doesn't work
title: Samsung note 3

author: Derek Smythe
comment: No volume control on moto 360. Pause play skip all work but not volume?
title: Works sort of

author: Aaron LeBoutillier
comment: Thank you so much for making this
title: Works great

comment: Great app, works just fine

author: Mark McLaren
comment: Works perfectly

author: Olaf Reger
comment: Just installed and tried. Does not seem to work with Sony SW2, possibly because SW2 connects to phone via BT rather than WiFi. Can that be changed? Happy to work with DEV to get this going. Contact me, if you like.
title: Does not seem to work on Sony SW2

author: Adam Runniff
comment: Looks amazing. But stuck on 'waiting for device' on watch (Sony smartwatch 3) unfortunate.
title: Unfortunate

author: Andy Regenscheid
comment: It connected to my Sonos system, but none of the controls work- volume changes and skipping didn't do anything.
title: Doesn't work

author: Greg Gasiorowski
comment: The app looks great but could not get it to work properly on my Sony Smartwatch 3 despite restarting/ reinstalling.
title: Looks great but...

author: Mark Drummond
comment: Useless and drains my watch battery in half a day

author: Dave Spina
comment: Couldn't get it to work
